name: .PLUSH
summary: Learn about .PLUSH files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open a PLUSH file with Plushify (Web). To do so, go to Plushify's homepage (linked below) and select the Load button (found in the page's upper-right corner). Then, navigate to and open your PLUSH file.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .plush file in Plushify
images.caption: PLUSH file open in Plushify
